#summary Qutip installation instructions

= Installation on Ubuntu Linux =

 * Requirements. 
{{{
sudo apt-get install python-scipy
sudo apt-get install python-tk
sudo apt-get install python-gtk2
sudo apt-get install python-matplotlib
}}}

 * QuTiP installation
{{{
sudo apt-get install python-setuptools
sudo python setup.py install
}}}

= Installation on Mac OS X =
 ==*Beginner*==
 
* Grab the latest Python 2.x installer from the Python website:

[http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.1/python-2.7.1-macosx10.6.dmg]

* After installation, grab the latest Numpy and Scipy Mac packages from:

[http://sourceforge.net/projects/numpy/files/NumPy/]

[http://sourceforge.net/projects/scipy/files/scipy/]

*making sure that they correspond to the Python version listed above (Py2.7).
